languages.text: {n}Кассия медленно кивает.{/n} "Отверстое око {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}навигатора{/g} несет погибель для каждого, кто будет озарен пагубным сиянием {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варпа{/g}, и потому есть символ нашего могущества. Мы — путеводные звезды Человечества, удостоенные особого дара, и одна из обязанностей, что вменяют нам — оберегать свое око даже от сторонних взглядов, что могут нести зло".

traits.locale_text: {n}Кассия медленно кивает, слегка запрокинув голову.{/n} "Открытое око навигатора несет погибель для каждого, кто осмелится встать у него на пути. Но верный слуга Императора никогда не направит свою силу против союзников".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia nods slowly.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}'s open eye is baneful to whoever the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}'s ruinous shine falls upon, and therefore it is the symbol of our power. We are the guiding stars of Humanity, found worthy of an uncommon gift, and one of the duties that we bear is to guard our eye even from wayward glances that may bear evil."
languages.original_text: {n}Кассия медленно кивает.{/n} "Отверстое око {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}навигатора{/g} несет погибель для каждого, кто будет озарен пагубным сиянием {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варпа{/g}, и потому есть символ нашего могущества. Мы — путеводные звезды Человечества, удостоенные особого дара, и одна из обязанностей, что вменяют нам — оберегать свое око даже от сторонних взглядов, что могут нести зло".

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia nods slowly.{/n} "The Navigator's open eye is baneful to whoever the Warp's ruinous shine falls upon, and therefore it is the symbol of our power. We are the guiding stars of Mankind, found worthy of an uncommon gift, and one of the duties that we bear is to guard our eye even from wayward glances that may bear evil."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

We are the guiding stars of Humanity, found worthy of an uncommon gift, and one of the duties that we bear is to guard our eye even from wayward glances that may bear evil."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}卡西娅缓缓点头。{/n}“{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}导航者{/g}的第三只眼睁开时，会射出{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}的毁灭之光，无论照在谁身上，都会带来灾祸。因此，它就是我们力量的象征。我们是人类的引路之星，我们拥有不同寻常的礼物。而我们的职责之一，便是保护好我们的眼睛，让它免受旁人侧目的影响，因为那些人的目光中可能包藏着邪恶。”
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia nods slowly.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}'s open eye is baneful to whoever the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}'s ruinous shine falls upon, and therefore it is the symbol of our power. We are the guiding stars of Humanity, found worthy of an uncommon gift, and one of the duties that we bear is to guard our eye even from wayward glances that may bear evil."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅缓缓点头。{/n}“{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}导航者{/g}的第三只眼睁开时，会射出{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}的毁灭之光，无论照在谁身上，都会带来灾祸。因此，它就是我们力量的象征。我们是人类的引路之星，我们拥有不同寻常的礼物。而我们的职责之一，便是保护好我们的眼睛，让它免受旁人侧目的影响，因为那些人的目光中可能包藏着邪恶。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Cassia nods slowly.{/n} "The Navigator's open eye is baneful to whoever the warp's ruinous shine falls upon, and therefore it is the symbol of our power. We are the guiding stars of Humanity, found worthy of an uncommon gift, and one of the duties that we bear is to guard our eye even from wayward glances that may bear evil."

languages.text: {n}Cassia asiente lentamente.{/n} «El ojo abierto de un {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navegante{/g} es nocivo para aquellos sobre los que recae el ruinoso brillo de la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g}, por lo que es el símbolo de nuestro poder. Somos las estrellas que guían a la humanidad, dignas de un don poco común. Uno de nuestros deberes es proteger nuestro ojo de miradas distraídas que puedan causar mal».
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia nods slowly.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}'s open eye is baneful to whoever the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}'s ruinous shine falls upon, and therefore it is the symbol of our power. We are the guiding stars of Humanity, found worthy of an uncommon gift, and one of the duties that we bear is to guard our eye even from wayward glances that may bear evil."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia asiente lentamente.{/n} «El ojo abierto de un {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navegante{/g} es nocivo para aquellos sobre los que recae el ruinoso brillo de la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g}, por lo que es el símbolo de nuestro poder. Somos las estrellas que guían a la humanidad, dignas de un don poco común. Uno de nuestros deberes es proteger nuestro ojo de miradas distraídas que puedan causar mal».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}カシアはゆっくりとうなずいた。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}の開かれた眼は、{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}歪み{/g}の破滅的な輝きが降り注ぐ者にとって有害なのです。それは、力の証なのですから。私たちは人類を導く星であり、類まれな贈り物にふさわしいと認められた者です。私たちに課せられた義務のひとつは、邪悪な眼差しから目を守ることです」
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia nods slowly.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}'s open eye is baneful to whoever the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}'s ruinous shine falls upon, and therefore it is the symbol of our power. We are the guiding stars of Humanity, found worthy of an uncommon gift, and one of the duties that we bear is to guard our eye even from wayward glances that may bear evil."

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアはゆっくりとうなずいた。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}の開かれた眼は、{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}歪み{/g}の破滅的な輝きが降り注ぐ者にとって有害なのです。それは、力の証なのですから。私たちは人類を導く星であり、類まれな贈り物にふさわしいと認められた者です。私たちに課せられた義務のひとつは、邪悪な眼差しから目を守ることです」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia nickt langsam.{/n} "Das offene Auge des {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigators{/g} bringt jedem Unheil, auf den der zerstörerische Glanz des {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warps{/g} fällt. Daher ist es das Symbol unserer Macht. Wir sind die Leitsterne der Menschheit, einer ungewöhnlichen Gabe für würdig befunden, und eine unserer Pflichten ist es, unser Auge selbst vor kurzen fehlgeleiteten Blicken zu schützen, die das Böse in sich tragen könnten."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia nods slowly.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}'s open eye is baneful to whoever the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}'s ruinous shine falls upon, and therefore it is the symbol of our power. We are the guiding stars of Humanity, found worthy of an uncommon gift, and one of the duties that we bear is to guard our eye even from wayward glances that may bear evil."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia nickt langsam.{/n} "Das offene Auge des {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigators{/g} bringt jedem Unheil, auf den der zerstörerische Glanz des {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warps{/g} fällt. Daher ist es das Symbol unserer Macht. Wir sind die Leitsterne der Menschheit, einer ungewöhnlichen Gabe für würdig befunden, und eine unserer Pflichten ist es, unser Auge selbst vor kurzen fehlgeleiteten Blicken zu schützen, die das Böse in sich tragen könnten."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia hoche lentement la tête.{/n} « L'œil ouvert d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navigateur{/g} est fatal pour quiconque baigne dans la funeste lumière du {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}, il est donc le symbole même de notre pouvoir. Nous sommes les guides de l'humanité et, en tant que tels, nous nous sommes vus attribuer un don rare. Ainsi, il est de notre devoir de protéger notre œil d'éventuels regards malveillants. »
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia nods slowly.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}'s open eye is baneful to whoever the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}'s ruinous shine falls upon, and therefore it is the symbol of our power. We are the guiding stars of Humanity, found worthy of an uncommon gift, and one of the duties that we bear is to guard our eye even from wayward glances that may bear evil."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia hoche lentement la tête.{/n} « L'œil ouvert d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navigateur{/g} est fatal pour quiconque baigne dans la funeste lumière du {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}, il est donc le symbole même de notre pouvoir. Nous sommes les guides de l'humanité et, en tant que tels, nous nous sommes vus attribuer un don rare. Ainsi, il est de notre devoir de protéger notre œil d'éventuels regards malveillants. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia yavaşça başıyla onaylıyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Rotacıların{/g} açık gözü, {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öteboyutun{/g} yıkıcı parıltısına maruz kalanların felaketine sebep olur. Bu yüzden de gücümüzün sembolüdür. Bizler, İnsanlığın alışılmadık bir lütuf bahşedilmiş rehberleriyiz. Vazifelerimizden biri de gözümüzü, içinde şer barındırabilecek en ufak ters bakıştan bile muhafaza etmektir."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia nods slowly.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}'s open eye is baneful to whoever the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}'s ruinous shine falls upon, and therefore it is the symbol of our power. We are the guiding stars of Humanity, found worthy of an uncommon gift, and one of the duties that we bear is to guard our eye even from wayward glances that may bear evil."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia yavaşça başını sallıyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Rotacı{/g}ların açık gözü, {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öteboyut{/g}un yıkıcı parıltısına maruz kalanların felaketine sebep olur; bu yüzden de gücümüzün sembolüdür. Bize bahşedilen bu nadir lütufla İnsanlığa yol gösteririz. Vazifelerimizden biri de gözümüzü, içinde şer barındırabilecek ters bakışlardan bile muhafaza etmektir."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
